about.title: About me
about.primary: I'm Kishan Thakur, a Frontend Developer with over 2 years of experience in crafting user-friendly websites. My expertise includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and ReactJS, and I'm always eager to explore new technologies. I pride myself on my detail-oriented approach and commitment to quality. My experience ranges from creating a Marketing Data Collection Web Application to automating web testing processes, honing my technical skills and emphasizing the importance of teamwork and communication.

projects.title: Marketing Data collection Web App
projects.description: The application includes a form for capturing customer details, tracking calls, and interest levels. Post submission, users are directed to a page displaying all data in a table for easy viewing and editing. A unique 'Today's Call' page shows contacts due for a call today, aiding in efficient daily management.
